thread.section_title: LightInTheBox 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 LightInTheBox 的点评意见 | www.lightinthebox.com
thread.title: Zvi Herman
thread.title_full: LightInTheBox 的点评人 Zvi Herman

author: Zvi Herman
title: Zvi Herman
text:
LightInTheBox is my favorite source of jewelry.
I have purchased jewelry for my wife, and I was alway impressed by the accurate description in their site, the prompt shipment and good packing.
The items were of very good quality and at very good prices.
I absolutely recommend buying from this company.
